ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Hello! I'm Keryan Cazaban, a passionate full-stack developer specialized in creating exceptional digital experiences. With expertise in modern web technologies, I help businesses and individuals transform their ideas into reality.
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION_2: I focus on building performant, maintainable, and user-friendly applications that solve real problems. Whether you need a complete web application, a responsive website, or custom development solutions, I'm here to help.

HOME.JOB_DESCRIPTION: Crafting modern, scalable web applications with cutting-edge technologies. Let's bring your ideas to life.
